name: Universidad de Granada
description: The University of Granada (UGR) is a public higher education institution, located in the city of Granada, southern Spain. The university has campuses in the Spanish cities of Granada, Ceuta and Melilla. Every year, over 2,000 European students attend the university through the LLP/ERASMUS programme, making it the programme's most popular destination. The total amount of students is estimated around 60.000.
